description: Create a new project labor classification
permissions: Allowed for admins or users who are manager members of the project's broker.
side_effects: Creates a project labor classification linking a project to a labor classification.
validation_notes: --project and --labor-classification are required. basic-hourly-rate and fringe-hourly-rate must be numeric values greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --basic-hourly-rate
flags.validation: Must be a numeric value greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --fringe-hourly-rate
flags.validation: Must be a numeric value greater than 0 when provided.
